newsitem.title: USA: Int'l Telecommunication files for offer.
newsitem.headline: Int'l Telecommunication files for offer.

text.p: International Telecommunication Data Systems Inc said on Friday it filed a registration statement for the sale of up to 2.1 million shares of common stock, including shares held by management and existing shareholders.

Of the shares offered, 900,000 shares will be offered by non-management shareholders, 700,000 will be offered by management and 500,000 will be offered by the company, International Telecommunication said.
The offering will be managed by Lehman Brothers, Alex. Brown and Sons Inc and Cowen & Co, the company said.
Proceeds to be received by the company from the proposed sale of 500,000 primary shares will be used for general corporate purposes, the company said.
